## mergeWithDefaults() function

create a new object that ensure all default properties are present

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function mergeWithDefaults<T extends object>(original: Partial<T>, defaults: T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  original | <code>Partial&lt;T&gt;</code> | original object |
|  defaults | <code>T</code> | default object |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T`
